definitions.definition: A big cat, Panthera leo, native to Africa, India and formerly much of Europe.
definitions.example: Tigers and lions share a common ancestor from a few million years ago.

definitions.definition: (by extension) Any of various extant and extinct big cats, especially the mountain lion.
An individual who shows strength and courage, attributes associated with the lion.
A famous person regarded with interest and curiosity.
A light brown color that resembles the fur of a lion.
An old Scottish coin, with a lion on the obverse, worth 74 shillings.
Of the light brown color that resembles the fur of a lion.
